messages.msgSnippet: This is for Wendy S. - what part of Georgia are you in?  We are in  Canton and have yet to meet any other unschoolers in our travels :) Also, I noticed that
messages.messageBody:
This is for Wendy S. - what part of Georgia are you in? We are in Canton
and have yet to meet any other unschoolers in our travels :)

Also, I noticed that Ren mentioned Tennessee - I remember you from a list a
long time ago and thought you were in Pensacola? I spoke with you (via
email) then, as I am from Pensacola.

Stephanie
_bofroggy@..._ (mailto:bofroggy@...)

By the way, I've been lurking for a while and I appreciate reading all the
insights from the seasoned members :) Every time I read a thread I look at
something a little differently and get a little closer to where I want to be.
Thanks to all!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
